description:
Workrave is a free program that assists in the recovery and prevention of Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI).

Workrave is a free program that assists in the recovery and prevention of Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI).
It monitors your keyboard and mouse usage and using this information, it frequently alerts you to take microbreaks, rest breaks and restricts you to your daily computer usage.
Workrave 1.10.52 has been released. Changes since Workrave 1.10.51.1:- Fix GNOME 45 compatibility (#508)
